mapper.select: select bll.code, bll.name, bd.name as department, bll.ip_address, bll.machine_name, bll.log_time from permission_user pu right join basicinfo_login_log bll on pu.code = bll.user_code left join basicinfo_department bd on bd.code =pu.department_code where bll.log_time between #{start} and #{end}

select bll.code, bll.name, bd.name as department, bll.ip_address, bll.machine_name, bll.log_time from permission_user pu right join basicinfo_login_log bll on pu.code = bll.user_code left join basicinfo_department bd on bd.code =pu.department_code
